name: A Falling Day (PLEASE READ WARNING)
description:
DISCLAIMER
This game contains graphic content, disturbing content, loud noises all based on real life events.
If you suffer from depression, anxiety or other mental illnesses, taking part in this experience is not recommended.

A Falling Day is an interactive experience/simulation which was created by Chris Fagan and Claudio Visentin.

The game takes places during a tragic event. You must try and save your son while others around you are calling for your help.

Will you even make it out alive?...

This game was created as an assignment for University: "Create a game which evokes an emotion".
